item.title: typing your json with json schema
item.description: what is a json schema how to add it to VISUAL STUDIO CODE Adding to the .vscode/settings.json "json.schemas": [ { "fileMatch": [ "models/*.schema.json" ], "url": "schema/schema.json" } ] how split json schema into multi files troubleshooting maps Maps, Records not working $schema: instead of workspace usefull links documentation https://json-schema.org/specification.html https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/languages/json#_json-schemas-and-settings libaries https://github.com/vega/ts-json-schema-generator https://www.npmjs.com/package/typescript-json-schema
